Hello, I'm Tung Do

I am a research resident at VinAI, advised by Prof. Binh-Son Hua (primary) and Dr. Rang Nguyen (secondary).

Before that, I recieved a B.Eng. degree in Computer Engineering at the University of Information Technology - VNUHCM.
